pushbuddy

Class Tags

  • java.lang.Object
    • pushbuddy.Tags

  • public class Tags
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps relationships between cloud files and local files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tags(java.lang.String tagFilePath)
      Initializes a new tag database.

    • Method Detail

      • rebuildData

        public void rebuildData()
        Called when WatchKey of database file is modified Parse the tag file and rebuild the database in memory.

      • add

        public void add(java.nio.file.Path local)
        Tags a local file to be synced to the cloud. If it is a directory, it is traversed recursively.
        Parameters:
        local - location on the local file system

      • isDuplRemoteDirectory

        public boolean isDuplRemoteDirectory(java.lang.String folder)
        Checks if there is a folder on cloud with the same name as param folder, but are actually different folders on the local machine
        Parameters:
        folder - The Path of the folder tagged
        Returns:

      • getLocalPath

        public java.nio.file.Path getLocalPath(java.lang.String remote)
        Get a local path from a cloud service's path.
        Parameters:
        remote - the remote file/folder location
        Returns:
        the file/folder location on the local machine, otherwise null

      • getRemotePath

        public java.lang.String getRemotePath(java.nio.file.Path local)
        Get a remote cloud-hosted path from a local path.
        Parameters:
        local - the local file/folder location
        Returns:
        the file/folder location on the cloud, otherwise null

      • localFilesChanged

        public boolean localFilesChanged()
        Checks whether any tagged local files changed on the filesystem.
        Returns:
        true there was a change, false otherwise

      • tagFileChanged

        public boolean tagFileChanged()
        Checks whether the local tag database has been modified.
        Returns:
        true if the file was modified, false otherwise

        Returns:

        public void clear()
        Clears all tagged files from the database.

        Returns:

      • isDuplRemote

        public boolean isDuplRemote(java.lang.String remotePath)
        Checks for Duplicate remote paths in this tag database
        Parameters:
        remotePath - the remote path to check against
        Returns:
        true if this remote path is already in the tag database

      • resolveRemoteDupl

        public java.lang.String resolveRemoteDupl(java.lang.String remotePath)
        Resolves Duplicate names in the remote file path if it needs to be resolved. Otherwise, no change Follows the renaming scheme: file, file(1), file(2), ... , file(n)
        Parameters:
        remotePath - the remote path to resolve
        Returns:
        the renamed remote file path

        public void printWatchedDirs()
